Title: 1. Independence Day
Description: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

Title: 2. Twister
Description: Two storm chasers on the brink of divorce must work together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

Title: 3. Mission: Impossible
Description: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.
filming_locations: ['Charles Bridge, Old Town, Prague, Czech Republic']

Title: 4. Jerry Maguire
Description: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.
filming_locations: ["Paco's Tacos - 4141 S. Centinela Avenue, Culver City, California, USA"]

Title: 5. Ransom
Description: Multi-millionaire Tom Mullen's son is kidnapped, but after initially agreeing to pay the ransom Mullen then decides to use the ransom money as a bounty.

Title: 6. 101 Dalmatians
Description: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat but creates an extravagant mess instead.
filming_locations: ['Minster Court, Mincing Lane, City of London, England, UK']

Title: 7. The Rock
Description: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.
filming_locations: ['Alcatraz Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA']

Title: 8. The Nutty Professor
Description: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.
filming_locations: ['Biltmore Hotel - 506 S. Grand Avenue, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA']

Title: 9. The Birdcage
Description: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing, conservative parents.
filming_locations: ['Carlyle Hotel - 1250 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, Florida, USA']

Title: 10. A Time to Kill
Description: A young Mississippi lawyer defends a black man who killed the two white men that raped his preteen daughter.

Description: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.
filming_locations: ['Robbins & Appleton Building, 1 Bond Street, New York City, New York, USA']

Title: 12. Phenomenon
Description: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

Title: 13. Scream
Description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

Title: 14. Eraser
Description: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

Title: 15. The Hunchback of Notre Dame
Description: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

production_companies: ['Walt Disney Pictures', 'Walt Disney Animation Studios', 'Walt Disney Feature Animation']

Title: 16. Michael

filming_locations: ['Gruene Hall - 1281 Gruene Road, New Braunfels, Texas, USA']

Title: 17. Star Trek: First Contact
Description: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.
filming_locations: ['Titan Missile Museum - 1580 W. Duval Mine Road, Green Valley, Arizona, USA']

Title: 18. Space Jam
Description: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

Title: 19. The English Patient
Description: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

Description: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.
production_companies: ['Twentieth Century Fox', 'Mark Gordon Productions', 'WCG Entertainment Productions']

Title: 21. Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
Description: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

Title: 22. Jingle All the Way
Description: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.
filming_locations: ['7th Place Mall - St. Peter & Wabasha Streets, St. Paul, Minnesota, USA']

Title: 23. The Cable Guy
Description: A designer makes a grievious mistake when he rejects the friendship of a borderline cable guy.
filming_locations: ['Medieval Times - 7662 Beach Blvd., Buena Park, California, USA']

Title: 24. Courage Under Fire

Title: 25. Jack
Description: Because of an unusual disorder that has aged him four times faster than a typical human being, a boy looks like a 40-year-old man as he starts fifth grade at public school after being homeschooled.

Title: 30. DragonHeart
Description: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragon-slaying knight must unite to stop an evil king, who was granted partial immortality.

Title: 32. Evita

Description: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

Description: After his grandmother's house is repossessed by the IRS, a bad tempered hockey player takes his talents to golf to earn the big bucks and get his grandmothers house back.

Description: David Helfgott, a gifted pianist, struggles through childhood as his dysfunctional father abuses him and his siblings. Years later, he suffers a mental breakdown but manages to return as a legend.

Title: 43. A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
Description: A fast paced, womanizing nightclub promoter gets paid back in full when he scorns a beautiful woman with psychotic tendencies who will punish him for breaking her heart.

Description: The Muppets set sail in search of treasure, with Jim Hawkins and Long John Silver.

Description: Government agents come after an amnesiac woman, who gradually remembers her past.

Description: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

Description: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

Title: 50. Black Sheep
Description: A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.

Description: Coincidences lead to the New York Knicks, getting its loudest fan, Edwina "Eddie" Franklin, as coach. Season victory?
filming_locations: ['Charlotte Coliseum - 100 Paul Buck Boulevard, Charlotte, North Carolina, USA']

Title: 52. Sgt. Bilko
Description: Sgt. Bilko is a well-liked conman in charge of the army base's motor pool, developing a hover tank and unofficially of gambling etc. One man hates Bilko and he's coming to inspect the base for possible closure.

Description: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

Title: 54. The Island of Dr. Moreau
Description: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that its inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange-looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.

Description: Amy moves to Ontario to live with her father after the death of her mother. Her father, an aviation expert, helps Amy lead a flock of orphaned geese south for the winters.

Description: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

Title: 65. The Craft
Description: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.

Description: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Description: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

Description: The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.

Title: 69. The Juror

Title: 70. My Fellow Americans
Description: Two former U. S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current, corrupt President at the risk of their lives.

Title: 71. Emma
Description: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

Title: 72. The Quest
Description: A group of gentlemen of fortune visits a legendary "Lost City", located in Tibet. They plan to steal a priceless statue "Golden Dragon" during the martial arts tournament.

Description: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

Title: 75. High School High

Title: 100. Flirting with Disaster
